message: Yes, BSidesCT, http://bsidesct.eventbrite.com, is shaping up really nice.  as is eXconference which is right after it. http://www.exconference.com/events/ http://excon.eventbrite.com
so rent a car and come to BSidesCT and then leave and make it to summercon for the sunrise :P
This is the same time as Summercon :/
eXcon, the event right after BSidesCT (www.exconference.com), is selling 50% off tickets.  Use the discount code, "SUPERZSECRET" on http://excon.eventbrite.com
I'm trying to pass along the existence of these conferences, but it is unclear how the two conferences are different....  They are at the same time/place?!
Okay, b-sides is until 4pm, and then excon takes over.  Got it.
Yes, they are two conferences in the same location on the same day but not at the same time.
